name: EnviroDIYMayfly
keywords: Mayfly, EnviroDIY, sensors, DS-3231, logger, SDI-12, libraries
description: A collection of libraries to support the EnviroDIY Mayfly

dependencies.name: EnviroDIY_ModularSensors
dependencies.note: EnviroDIY ModularSensors - A library that allows access to multiple sensors through a unified interface.

dependencies.name: EnviroDIY_DS3231
dependencies.note: An Arduino library for the DS3231 RTC (Real Time Clock), based off of the Sodaq_DS3231 library.

dependencies.name: EnableInterrupt
dependencies.note: GreyGnome's EnableInterrupt - Assign an interrupt to any supported pin on all Arduinos

dependencies.name: SdFat
dependencies.note: SdFat - FAT16/FAT32 file system for SD cards.

dependencies.name: Adafruit BusIO
dependencies.note: Adafruit BusIO, a dependency of other Adafruit libraries

dependencies.name: Adafruit ADS1X15
dependencies.note: Driver for TI's ADS1015: 12-bit Differential or Single-Ended ADC with PGA and Comparator.  This fork removes bugs in the Adafruit original library.

dependencies.name: Adafruit AM2315
dependencies.note: AOSong AM2315 I2C Temp/Humidity Sensor Library by Adafruit

dependencies.name: Adafruit BME280 Library
dependencies.note: Bosch BME280 Temp/Humidity/Pressure Sensor Library by Adafruit

dependencies.name: DHT sensor library
dependencies.note: AOSong DHT Sensor Library by Adafruit

dependencies.name: Adafruit INA219
dependencies.note: This is a library for the Adafruit INA219 high side DC current sensor boards

dependencies.name: Adafruit MPL115A2
dependencies.note: MPL115A2 Barometer Library by Adafruit

dependencies.name: Adafruit TSL2561
dependencies.note: TAOS TSL2561 Luminosity Sensor Library by Adafruit

dependencies.name: Adafruit Unified Sensor
dependencies.note: Adafruit Unified Sensor Library

dependencies.name: BMP388_DEV
dependencies.note: An Arduino compatible, non-blocking, I2C/SPI library for the Bosch BMP388 barometer.

dependencies.name: DallasTemperature
dependencies.note: DallasTemperature - Arduino Library for Dallas Temperature ICs (DS18B20, DS18S20, DS1822, DS1820)

dependencies.name: OneWire
dependencies.note: OneWire - Control 1-Wire protocol (DS18S20, DS18B20, DS2408 and etc)

dependencies.name: GPRSbee
dependencies.note: An Arduino library for the SODAQ GPRSbee.

dependencies.name: RTCTimer
dependencies.note: Sodaq Real Time Clock (RTC) Timer Library

dependencies.name: Sodaq_PcInt
dependencies.note: Sodaq Pin Change Interrupt Library

dependencies.name: Sodaq_PcInt_PCINT0
dependencies.note: Sodaq library controlling pin change interrupts - modified to use only interrupt vector 0.

dependencies.name: SDI-12
dependencies.note: EnviroDIY SDI-12 Library for Arduino

dependencies.name: SDI-12_ExtInts
dependencies.note: EnviroDIY SDI-12 Library, dependent on external library for interrupts

dependencies.name: SDI-12_PCINT3
dependencies.note: EnviroDIY SDI-12 Library - modified to use only interrupt vector 3.

dependencies.name: SoftwareSerial_ExtInts
dependencies.note: Arduino SoftwareSerial Library - modified to use interrupts called by an external library.
Arduino SoftwareSerial Library - modified to use only interrupt vectors 1 and 2.
dependencies.name: SoftwareSerial_PCINT12
KellerModbus
dependencies.note: Arduino library for communication with Keller pressure and water level sensors via Modbus.

dependencies.name: MS5803
dependencies.note: General interface to MS5803-series pressure transducers

dependencies.name: Tally_Library_I2C
dependencies.note: An Arduino library for interfacing to the Project Tally Event counter from NorthernWidget.

dependencies.name: NeoSWSerial
dependencies.note: Another alternative for software serial port emulation.

dependencies.name: PubSubClient
dependencies.note: A client library for MQTT messaging.

dependencies.name: RTCZero
dependencies.note: Functions for using the processor real time clock in SAMD21 processors

dependencies.name: SDL_SSD1306
dependencies.note: Library for SwitchDoc Labs Grove OLED 128x64

dependencies.name: SensorModbusMaster
dependencies.note: EnviroDIY SensorModbusMaster - Arduino library for communicating via modbus with the Arduino acting as the modbus master.

dependencies.name: TinyGSM
dependencies.note: A small Arduino library for GPRS modules.

dependencies.name: YosemitechModbus
dependencies.note: Arduino library for communication with Yosemitech sensors via Modbus.

dependencies.name: SparkFun PCA9536 Arduino Library
dependencies.note: An Arduino Library for the PCA9536 4-bit port expander.

dependencies.name: Adafruit SHT4x Library
dependencies.note: Arduino library for SHT4x temperature & humidity sensor.

dependencies.name: Adafruit SSD1306
dependencies.note: SSD1306 oled driver library for monochrome 128x64 and 128x32 displays.

dependencies.name: Adafruit GFX Library
dependencies.note: Adafruit GFX graphics core library, this is the 'core' class that all our other graphics libraries derive from.
